sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Paper, Typography, CircularProgress, Divider} from "@material-ui/core" import {useParams, useHistory} from "react-router-dom" import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux" import useStyles from "./styles" import "./details.css" const PostDetails = () => { const posts = useSelector(state => state.posts) const classes = useStyles() const dispatch = useDispatch() const {id} = useParams() return (
{!posts.length ? : (
{posts.map(post => (
{post.title} {post.tags.map((tag) => `#${tag} `)} {post.message} Created by: {post.name} {moment(post.createdAt).fromNow()} Realtime Chat - coming soon! Comments - coming soon!
{!!recommendedPosts.length && (
You might also like:
{recommendedPosts.map(({ title, name, message, likes, selectedFile, _id }) => (
openPost(_id)} key={_id}> {title} {name} {message} Likes: {likes.length}
))}
)} ))}
)}
) } export default PostDetails
